meanings.sent1: She was outacting all her classmates in the school play.
meanings.sent2: The famous actor was outacting everyone on stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat was outacting the dog in their little play fight.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were outacting her rational thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The young actress was outacting seasoned professionals with her talent.

meanings.definition: The act of surpassing in acting ability.
meanings.sent1: His outacting of the lead role earned him a standing ovation.
meanings.sent2: The outacting in that movie was truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: The outacting in the school play had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her outacting of her own fears was inspiring to watch.
meanings.sent5: The outacting of emotions made the audience feel every moment.
